name: Shellflower
description:
Shellflower is a story-heavy puzzle platformer about a young girl, Bec, and her floating cube companion, as they journey through an abstract world to find and fix the continuum reactor, a device that maintains the fabric of time and space. Use your cube to manipulate objects' gravity in order to solve a variety of puzzles!

FAQ

  • Is this a demo?
    • Nope, you've got yourself a full game right here!
  • How long does it take to beat the game?
    • Around 2-3 hours. Depends on how good you are at puzzles. :)
  • Do I have to play it all at once?
    • The game auto-saves every room, so you don't have to play it in one sitting!
  • How do I play?
    • You need a keyboard and mouse to play. Controls are introduced in-game.
  • The game window is tiny! How do I make it bigger?
    • You can use your browser's zoom feature to make the window bigger, or press F to toggle fullscreen (recommended).
  • What browser should I use?
    • This game has been tested to work in the latest Chrome and Firefox. It should work on other browsers, but if you encounter any issues (such as lack of sound) please let me know!
  • Are there standalone applications/executables?
    • There are currently no standalone applications. If you really want one, bug me about it on Twitter.
  • I found a bug! What do I do?
    • You can contact me using any of the methods below. Thank you for helping make the game the best it can be!
  • Can I stream/lets play the game?
    • Please do!
  • I found the directory with your game's art and code >:) Can I use any of it in my game?
    • Sure! You can pretty much do whatever you'd like with the art and code (good luck reading the code, though). However, you cannot use any sounds from the game, since I do not own many of them!
